title: My First Quarto based webpage
text:
Quarto: My New Best Friend for Web Development
I can’t even begin to express how excited I am right now! I just finished building my first webpage using Quarto, and it’s absolutely incredible. Say goodbye to the days of manually wrestling with HTML and CSS to create a decent layout. Quarto has completely changed the game for me.
I mean, who would’ve thought that combining the simplicity of Markdown with the power of Python and R could result in such stunning webpages? It’s like magic! I’m already dreaming up all the amazing projects I can tackle with this tool.

Has anyone else jumped on the Quarto bandwagon yet? I’d love to hear about your experiences!

title: About Me
text:
B.Tech Computer Science (Second Year) | Saintgits College of Engineering (Autonomous), Kottayam, Kerala
Full-stack developer with a strong foundation in Go, JavaScript (Svelte), HTML, CSS, and Sass. Proficient in building robust web applications and IoT solutions. Successfully delivered projects for Malayalam FC and National HSS. Eager to contribute to innovative projects and grow as a developer.
Skills: Linux, Git, Node.js, Vim.



Malayalam FC, Peringotukara www.malayalamfc.com
National Higher Secondary School, Irinjalakuda www.nationalhss.in
